headline: Comparator Drug Sourcing Global Market Review 2021-2025 and Forecast 2026-2031 Featuring Clinigen, BAP Pharma Group, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Laboratory Corporation of America, Catalent and More
summary: Opportunities in the market include the rising demand due to increased clinical trials & biosimilar developments, especially in oncology and immunology. Advanced cold chain logistics and AI-driven demand forecasting also represent growing areas for innovation and investment.
